WeatherAlertRainMessage: Chances of rain are high for the next hour
WeatherAlertHighMessage: In the next hour the temperature exceeds 35 celsius degrees, shelter in a safe place
WeatherAlertLowMessage: In the next hour the temperature drops below zero celsius degrees
InstructionsWeather: Use the weather button to discover if there is bad weather incoming.
InstructionsAR: Tap the camera button and point the device to a specific point of interest to enjoy an immersive experience using augmented reality in which you'll discover interesting infomations about the place you're at.
